title: Behavior custom rules broken in 5.2
body:
### Description

```

/home/runner/work/cakephp-captcha/cakephp-captcha/tests/TestCase/Model/Behavior/CaptchaBehaviorTest.php:98
```

The rule is
```php
			$validator->add('captcha_result', [
				'maxPerUser' => [
					'rule' => 'validateCaptchaMaxPerUser',
					'provider' => 'table',
					'message' => __d('captcha', 'Limit reached. Please retry later'),
					'last' => true,
				],
			]);
```
and the method for it inside the Table class:
```php
	public function validateCaptchaMaxPerUser($value, $context) {
		// If no id was provided, the captcha was dummy due to MaxRule failure
		return !empty($context['data']['captcha_id']);
	}
```

This is a regression as before 5.0/5.1 this was working fine.

### CakePHP Version

5.2

### PHP Version

8.3
